title: Iris - The Growing Breeze (Iris 1)
hero: Iris 1 Guide - Using Flame Spirit for leveling, which can transition to Thunder Spirit or Erosion Spirit later.

items.title: Act 1
items.content: Play through Act 1 focusing on movement and survivability. Use skill X and Y.

items.title: Act 2
items.content: Transition to ability Z, prioritize gear with stat A.
